 this is the home dir of the webapp must be set by the inheriting class

 this is the home dir for pages
 $gpPageName = 'p'
 used internally
 $gpEventsName = 'e'
 this is the name of the GET variable which contains the event names
 $defaultPageName = 'default'
 this is the name of the default page which will be instantiate if none is supplied in the URL
 $currentPage
 used internally
 $errorPageName = '404'
 this is the dafault error page name if something goes wrong
 $gp
 contains the GET & POST variables

Detailed Description

This is the application controller.

This is the controller which initializes the internal variables and calls the SAPageHandler::handle method which will instantiate the page class, run its events and display it

Definition at line 25 of file SApplication.php.
